title: Is This a Photograph of a World Trade Center Tourist on 9/11?
subtitle: A chilling photograph seemingly captures an unlucky tourist posing on the WTC on 9/11 an instant before a plane crashed into it.
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: Photograph captures an unlucky tourist posing on the observation deck of a World Trade Center tower on 9/11, seconds before a hijacked airliner smashed into the building.
